Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Record Class Student

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public record Student(Color color) extends Record implements Serializable
The students are the "passive" protagonists of the game. Each player can decide for their lives, and place them in their school or onto the islands as they wish. Doing so, the players gain influence and eventually the craftier wins the game. Each student has a Color.

    • moveToTable

      public void moveToTable(Player player) throws NonExistentColorException, FullTableException
      Adds the student to the given player's dining room, at the proper Table, if possible.
      Parameters:
      player - the given Player.
      Throws:
      NonExistentColorException - if a table of a non-existent color is somehow accessed (it should never happen, so it is safely ignorable).
      FullTableException - if the table of the student's color from the given player's dining room is full.

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
